query: 如图,在矩形ABCD中,AB=3,BC=5,点E在对角线AC上,连接BE,作EF⊥BE,垂足为E,直线EF交线段DC于点F,则\frac{EF}{BE}=()选项：['\\frac{4}{3}', '\\frac{5}{3}', '\\frac{3}{4}', '\\frac{3}{5}']
answer: 解:如图,连接BF,取BF的中点O,连接OE,OC．∵四边形ABCD是矩形,EF⊥BE,∴∠BEF=∠BCF=90°,AB=CD=3,BC=AD=5,∵OB=OF,∴OE=OB=OF=OC,∴B,C,F,E四点共圆,∴∠EBF=∠ECF,∴tan∠EBF=tan∠ACD,∴\frac{EF}{EB}=\frac{AD}{CD}=\frac{5}{3},故选:B．
